rooms.description: A spacious entrance with Vastu-compliant placement near the north or east side to welcome positive energy.

An open-plan area that merges living space and an open kitchen, following Brutalist design with raw concrete finishes and exposed structural elements. The layout accommodates wheelchair accessibility with wide doorways and unobstructed circulation paths.
A compact studio bedroom that doubles as a sleeping area with integrated storage. Vastu guidelines ensure placement in the northeast to harness prosperity and balance.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible door with smooth threshold and automatic opener for ease of access.
Large windows that ensure natural light penetration, placed on the south wall for optimal solar gain according to Vastu.
Smaller windows placed to ensure privacy while still benefiting from natural light.

special_features.description: A gently sloping ramp with non-slip surface and handrails ensuring safe access from the garden to the entrance.

garden.description: Large garden with native landscaping elements that promote a sense of calm and sustainability. The layout follows Vastu principles by ensuring clear boundaries and harmonious flow between built spaces and nature.
